content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) has a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- The offshore pump is connected to a pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and another pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- The steam engine is part of an electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5), a transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5), and another transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not waiting for fuel.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not waiting for ingredients.

### Errors when using entities without connection to electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not disconnected from the electric network.

### Errors when using entities without source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not waiting for source items.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
